properties.name: user.registration.keycloak.serverUrl
properties.description: The url the keycloak server is running.

properties.name: user.registration.keycloak.realm
properties.description: The Keycloak realm the user shall be created.

properties.name: user.registration.keycloak.username
properties.description: A user with role manage-users in realm mgmt Role Mapping

properties.name: user.registration.keycloak.pasword
properties.description: The password for user with role manage-users in realm mgmt Role Mapping

properties.name: user.registration.keycloak.clientId
properties.description: The client id tha invokes the user creation (admin-cli).

properties.name: user.registration.keycloak.verifyEmailRedirectUrl
properties.description: The url of the web-app the user should be redirected for email-confirmation'

properties.name: user.registration.keycloak.verifyEmailExpiration
properties.description: Time duration in minutes that the verification link is active
